casebody.data:
W. E. NESMITH, Plaintiff in Error, v. WAR FINANCE CORPORATION, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fourth Circuit. November 24, 1926.) No. 2559. Phillip H. Arrowsmith, of Florence, S. C., for plaintiff in error. William M. Shand, of Columbia, S. C. (Bcnet, Shand & McGowan, of Columbia, S. C., on the brief), for defendant in error.

Before WADDILL, ROSE, and PARKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

We find no error in the rulings below. Affirmed.
